titleStmt.title: De morbis puerorum, or, a treatise of the diseases of children; with their causes, signs, prognosticks, and cures, for the benefit of such as do not understand the Latine tongue, and very useful for all such as are house-keepers, and have children. With the contents of the several chapters, as also an alphabetical table of all the diseases mentioned herein. By Robert Pemell practitioner in physick, at Cranebrooke in Kent. May the 29. 1653.
titleStmt.author: Pemell, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Legatt, for Philemon Stephens, at the guilded Lion in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the guilded Lion in Pauls Church-yard.
